column1: Glyphosate is the poisonous ingredient in some weed killers.
Glyphosate is in weed killers with these brand names: - Roundup - Bronco - Glifonox - Kleen-up - Rodeo - Weedoff Other products may also contain glyphosate.

Symptoms of glyphosate poisoning include: - Abdominal cramps - Anxiety - Breathing difficulty - Coma - Blue lips or fingernails (rare) - Diarrhea - Dizziness - Drowsiness - Headache - Irritation in the mouth and throat - Low blood pressure - Nausea - Vomiting (may vomit blood) - Weakness
